MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY14 postcode area of Malpas, affecting properties in a widespread area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:20PM on 4th February 2021
